description:
Renforcement de la Justice et de la Reforme du Secteur de la Securité (RSS) en Guinée-Bissau 
MDG-F Country thematic Window for: Conflict Prevention and Peace -building

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthening national capacities, including civil societies on the consolidatio of democratic governance
subproject.description:
Output 1.1: 
The revision and development of new legislation and regulatory measures in support of justice and security sector reform inline with CEDAW and other women’ right International Law and regional law framework.

Output 1.2: 
Parliamentary oversight of justice and security sector reform strengthened.

Output 1.3:
Increased capacity of relevant ministries to implement the National Strategy for the Restructuring and Modernization of the Security Sector.

Output 2.1: Enhanced access to justice services, particularly for vulnerable populations including women.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Renforcement  Justice RSS
